ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: It all comes down to who can do more damage.  Other group camping?  Camp there as well and boot em out.  I play on Rallos Zek where people will kill you for a
ygData.messageBody:
It all comes down to who can do more damage. Other group camping? Camp
there as well and boot 'em out. I play on Rallos Zek where people will kill
you for a lesser offense. But that's the way it is. Highpass is notorious
for groups that camp its areas, but what are you going to do? Whine? Make
some friends and beat 'em to the punch. That's the only way to do it, and
that's the way Verant will say to do it. You guys got it easy. At least
you don't have PKillers sitting on all the major bridges ready ta nail ya ;)
But Rallos was my choice, and I'm not gunna bitch about that. If yer a
single warrior trying to beat up Grenix, trust me, you need a group anyway.
Don't complain if yer trying to solo, just get some wizzie friends.


-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 27, 1999 10:51 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor


>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>My only problem with that is, like I said, its people who horde these items
that cause the camping problem. I'm 28th lvl, have tried many many many
many many times to get a tommy, I've tried for HOURS working to get me one,
but its always camped, usually by guys that already have 2 tommys in hand.
>
>As the leader of my guild, I know that twinking goes on, I don't have a
problem with that, but all of our twinking is done by passing down our old
equipment when we get better stuff, or by helping our lower level friends to
camp the items they need. We don't just farm items to give out at later
dates.
>
>This conversation is bordering on pissing me off, (nothing personal, just
the way the game works), and while I'm still in a good mood from getting my
jboots, I'll quit reading emails :)
>
>>>> "Jim Peterson" <jim@...> 5.27.99 9:47:11 AM >>>
>From: "Jim Peterson" <jim@...>
>
>I think it's perfectly feasible to have some in guild twinking. I've been
>arming my warriors with tomahawks and bronze and my shamans with Screamers.
>There is nothing wrong with it. We are starting a Guild Armory and
>Treasury.
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, May 27, 1999 10:42 AM
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
>
>
>>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>>
>>I hate it when people get twinked out like you. Its people like you that
>cause the camping problem. Your guildmates camped for their items, which I
>don't have a problem with, the continued FARMING to get items for
>guildmates, blah. I've never had a single magic item given to me, I've
been
>there beside my guild buds working to get my items the whole game......ok I
>shut up now
>>
>>>>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.26.99 9:19:28 PM >>>
>>From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>>
>>Well I just got my SOW ring, Shiny Brass shield (Is it better then tower
>>shield?) and my travelr's back-pack! Wow I have 1 SOW ring, one cuthroat
>>ring and two onyx earrigns, man, I swing like a best couse my DEX is +2
and
>>I prob. run 3/5 faster! Plus with this travelr's back-pack it's great,
>>everything that goes into it gest reduced in weight super light! Wow, Now
>my
>>weight is around 60/98 This rocks! HeY I'll find oue where and who you
get
>>the sSOW rings of off later tonight, I'm makeing my trip down to freeport
>so
>>WISH ME LUCK!!!
>>
>>Dealan, Karana Server
>>
>>----Original Message Follows----
>>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

>>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor

>>

>>
>>All the Bloodstained armour (tunic, mantle and gloves) can be looted off
>the
>>Skeletal Knight who resides in unrest. He conned red to me at level 20.
>He
>>has a harm touch of 350hp. He always comes with an entourage when pulled.
>I
>>was in a level 25 party when we killed him, and our lead tank (a ranger)
>>nearly died in the battle (he had a slither of red left).
>>
>>But I am VERY interested in the SoW ring. Only item that does the same
>>thing this ring you mentioned does, that I know off, are the journey man
>>boots. Looking at getting these with a level 30 party.
>>
>> > ----------
